description: Fantastic Clinical Aromatherapy conference at Edinburgh Botanical Gardens. Thanks to The Essence of Clinical Aromatherapy International Seminar team Rhiannon...
cleaned_text: at University of Nottingham Fantastic Clinical Aromatherapy conference at Edinburgh Botanical Gardens. Thanks to The Essence of Clinical Aromatherapy International Seminar team [Rhiannon Lewis](https://fr.linkedin.com/in/rhiannon-lewis-76a80843?trk=public_post-text), [Marie-Anne James](https://uk.linkedin.com/in/marie-anne-james-a2203120?trk=public_post-text), and [Julia Falkenstein](https://de.linkedin.com/in/juliafalkenstein?trk=public_post-text) for putting on such a wonderful and informative conference and providing us with so many opportunities to connect with inspirational people in such a marvellous location.
